## Source: amazon-inspector (d3dc7edeef3a237ea7dca726f170bdbe2e150c7818ba80f23c7d3ba8f7337906)
The package elf-stats-nutmeg-stockpile-999 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8822a2e46635ec55aa07e8237606984fbc1b1fed504af23fcb935dda5e76c41d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'elf-stats-nutmeg-stockpile-999' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
